children.name: with_tax_amount
children.desc: 含税总金额（含税成本单价*数量）（元）

requestParams.name: order_type
requestParams.desc: 出库单类型(PSCK=配送出库; BSCK=报损出库;PKCK=盘亏出库;DBCK=调拨出库; YHTHCK=要货退货出库)

requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 零售调用来源（调用方和有赞约定的值）

requestParams.name: source_order_no
requestParams.desc: 关联单据号，如交易出库关联的订单号

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['source_order_no']="SDB190103170036145174"
params['remark']="test"
params['order_type']="DBCK"
params['order_items']="[{"quantity":"10","sku_code":"huang-13-b","supplierCode":"","withTaxAmount":"100","withTaxCost":"10"}]"
params['creator']="vam"
params['create_time']="2018-10-10 10:00:00"
params['biz_bill_no']="111111111"
params['retail_source']="GUANYIYUN"
params['warehouse_code']="CK00001"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.open.stockoutorder.create', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'SDB190103170036145174', 'remark' => 'test', 'order_type' => 'DBCK', 'order_items' => '[{"quantity":"10","sku_code":"huang-13-b","supplierCode":"","withTaxAmount":"100","withTaxCost":"10"}]', 'creator' => 'vam', 'create_time' => '2018-10-10 10:00:00', 'biz_bill_no' => '111111111', 'retail_source' => 'GUANYIYUN', 'warehouse_code' => 'CK00001', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';
